name: AEROPORT COLLEGE OF AVIATION & TRAVEL MANAGEMENT
about: Aeroport College of Aviation & Travel Management, established in 2016, is a leading provider of aviation education in Nigeria. Located near the International Airport, the college offers a dynamic learning environment that combines academic theory with practical hands-on experience. As an Approved Aviation Training Organization (ATO) by the Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) and an Accredited Training Centre by the Institute for Tourism Professionals of Nigeria (ITPN), Aeroport is committed to raising travel professionals who excel in their careers. The college provides personal coaching, state-of-the-art training modules, and flexible payment plans. With experienced and IATA-certified instructors, Aeroport prepares students for successful careers in aviation, travel, tourism, and hospitality, often leading to immediate industrial attachments and permanent employment. Join Aeroport for an extraordinary educational experience that shapes your future in aviation.
services:
["DRONE PILOTING (DPT)
HELICOPTER LANDING OFFICER (HLO)
AVIATION MANAGEMENT (AVM)
ADVANCED FLIGHT DISPATCHER (AFD)
BASIC FLIGHT DISPATCHER (BFD)
DEGREE PROGRAMME (DGP)
CABIN CREW AB-INITIO (CCT)"]
